## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and user-specific files

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
[Dd]ebug/
[Rr]elease/
x64/
x86/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]64/
bld/
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
[Ll]ogs/

# .NET Core build folders
out/
artifacts/
publish/
TestResults/
.vs/

# Visual Studio 2022 auto-generated folders
.vscode/
.vsconfig

# Rider and VS Code project metadata
.idea/
.vscode/

# Resharper files
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper
*.DotSettings.user

# Tye
.tye/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.userprefs

# IIS Express
/.vs/
*.vspscc
applicationhost.config

# Autogenerated files from scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# Azure
*.azurePubxml
*.pubxml
*.publishsettings
PublishProfiles/

# NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
*.nuspec
*.nuget.props
*.nuget.targets
packages/
*.nuget.cache
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json

# Entity Framework Migrations
*MigrationsSnapshot.cs

# AWS / Azure / Docker
.env
docker-compose.override.yml
docker-compose.*.yml
**/docker-compose.vs.debug.*
**/docker-compose.vs.release.*
**/.aws-sam/
**/aws-lambda-tools-defaults.json
aws-lambda-tools-defaults.json
*.tmp
secrets.json

# Local database files
*.mdf
*.ldf
*.dbmdl
*.bak
*.sqlproj.user

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Coverage & Test
coverage/
*.coverage
*.coveragexml
*.trx

# Logs and diagnostic data
*.log
*.tlog
*.svclog
*.pidb

# Misc
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini
$RECYCLE.BIN/
*.dbmdl
*.DS_Store

# Node (if you have Angular/React front-end)
node_modules/
npm-debug.log
yarn-error.log

# Compiled front-end assets
dist/
build/

**/bin/
**/obj/

# Angular
web/node_modules/
web/dist/
web/.angular/

# GitHub Copilot / cache / artifacts
.gitconfig.local
*.generated.cs
*.cache
*.swp
*.swo
*.tmp

# Secrets / credentials
appsettings.*.json
!appsettings.json  # Keep base config only
secrets.json

# Backup and temp files
*.bak
*.orig
*.tmp
*.old
*.temp
